title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1260.3 - Certificates of acceptability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1260.3 - Certificates of acceptability

State Regulations

The State Fire Prevention and Building Code Council may
issue certificates of acceptability, solely to manufacturers, for materials and
devices acceptable under the Uniform Fire Prevention and Building Code, which
shall be effective for a period of two years from the date of issuance and
which may be renewed for additional periods of two years
each. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1260.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
